volunteers.name: Soham Chakrabourty
volunteers.blurb: Working in neurology-AI research at the Mayo Clinic for the last two years, representing Canada at Worlds Speech & Debate Championships, social entrepreneurship … Yes, I have an eclectic array of interests. But witnessing my grandparents face the stigma and cultural-linguistic barriers to access care inspired me to channel those interests to scale cognitive therapies to seniors in need.

volunteers.name: Jack Qiu
volunteers.blurb: Zicheng is a student leader, entrepreneur and caregiver, leading five different clubs and initiatives across a diverse arrangement of areas. He has an outstanding commitment to community service and civil engagement. This is illustrated through over over 180 hours of volunteering, helping local summer school programs as a teacher’s assistant. In senior care, Zicheng leads two initiatives, Connecting for Care and MindSight as well as the ongoing entrepreneurial project Listenurse.
